Andrew Sosa


I'm a software engineer focusing on data engineering and pipeline automation. Check out my github, linkedin, resume page, resume pdf or send me an email.

Here's some stuff I've been working on.


Stargazer

A React-built webapp to find your friends on Github. Uses Github OAuth and runs entirely client side (no server required).

Github / Live


dev-tools

An ES6 Workspace Setup Script. Installs linters, formatters, plugins, and has optional support for React.

Github / NPM


Dockron

Simple proof-of-concept cron for running tasks in Docker containers.

Github / NPM


Eeyore

NPM package to automagically fetch someone's pinned repos from their Github profile.

Github / NPM


andrewsosa.dev

My personal website. Gets rewritten every 3 months to test out some new web tech. You're probably here right now. Currently built with 11ty and newcss.

Github / Live


noles.dev

Retired phonebook of FSU alumni developers. Built using React, Gatsby, Netlify, AWS, and the serverless framework.

Github


todo-service

Simple proof-of-concept microservice implementing a basic to-do list. Written in under 100 lines of Javascript.

Github
